name: Jeremy McGrath's Offroad
description:
In Jeremy McGrath's Offroad, players take on the competition in four-wheeled 800 horsepower off-road race trucks with tons of air time and gameplay options, including a host of tracks, single-player and multiplayer modes as well as a wide load-out of vehicle classes including Rally Cars and Pro Buggies, all in a crispy 1080p, 60 frames per second presentation. With multiplayer support for eight racers and a robust career mode, Jeremy McGrath's Offroad will be the title for racing fans who want to get down and dirty off-road!
